BrainCoord

Applied knowledge¶

BrainCoord version 0.1 was born as a graduate course project. The knowledge acquired in the course “Selected Python programming topics” has been applied in this program, which includes:

  • classes:

    • attributes

    • methods (private, public)

  • strategy (iteration)

  • definition of functions

  • loggin

  • decorations (parser, click@)

  • testing

  • Dockstrings and comments:

    • sphinx

  • enviroments

  • files reading

  • libraries (import)

  • exceptions

  • debugging

  • GitHub repository
